## TextAreaResize variable

Resize mode for a TextArea

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
TextAreaResize: {
    readonly none: "none";
    readonly both: "both";
    readonly horizontal: "horizontal";
    readonly vertical: "vertical";
}
```
